title: Bug 124193Parent axis doesn't work for recursive XPath
description: Bug 124193Parent axis doesn't work for recursive XPath When table mapping for XML files is specified via recursive XPath: e.g. "/bookstore/book".
OB: "//book", the parent axis access is broken for column mappings on such table: e.g. "../bookstore/@name" will not work.Same parent axis access works fine if nonrecursive XPath is used for table mapping: e.g.
